Leila wrote:

> I have no idea where to start.  Since the following
> code would not compile:
> Pair p = (Pair) invoke(d, "mostFlexible", new Object[]
> { mcss });
> Pair (the inner class) is not recognized in junitx
> test.

Is the inner class static? If so, use "Outer.Pair" instead of just 
"Pair" as the class name.

If not, then I recommend making it static, because non-static inner 
classes are almost always needless complexity.

Good luck.
